wordpressPost.title: Tabu
wordpressPost.content:
Last night my memory was tricked into remembering Tabu, a Slovene band I used to quite enjoy when I was quite some younger. Naturally I went to youtube and tried to see what I could have a listen to but alas there was naught to be found, which of course lead to doing what any responsible adult would – going to their website, stealing all the videos they make available and putting them on youtube. Hope they don't mind the free publicity.

  •  Lahko Sem Srce
  • Angel
  • Divje
  • Tabu
  • V soju luci
